section.title: Version Section
section.para: This document contains absolutely no actual content, information, or other interesting material. In fact it is only here to serve one purpose and that is to store the chapterinfo in the blue box above that is being used by several other documents.
The following line is the code to be put into the document you wish to include the above version info in:
DateVer is the id we provided to be able to reference it.
All content herein is but a placeholder to maintain a valid document that we can use it's bookinfo/date element for our other purposes.
Think of this document like a government bureaucracy, a whole lot of overhead to do essentially nothing!
